definition: Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/also called 水瓶座
seat/base/stand/CL:個|个[ge4]/classifier for buildings, mountains and similar immovable objects

sentences.english: Aquarius People are likely to socialise with family friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 宝瓶座倾向于跟家友和亲戚交往。

sentences.english: Pisces lies between Aries and Aquarius in the northern skies.
sentences.chinese: 双鱼位于北方天空中白羊座和宝瓶座之间。

sentences.english: Aquarians are very friendly people, great conversationalists and thinkers.
sentences.chinese: 宝瓶座的人非常友好，是个口才绝佳的思想家。

sentences.english: A constellation in the equatorial region of the Southern Hemisphere near Aquarius and Eridanus.
sentences.chinese: 鲸鱼座南半球赤道地区靠近宝瓶座与波江座的星座。

sentences.english: Compared with famous has the aquarius ear annular nebula and the lyra ring nebula.
sentences.chinese: 比较著名的有宝瓶座耳轮状星云和天琴座环状星云。

sentences.english: Coming, or the birth of the Aquarian Age.
sentences.chinese: 你能到精神上的知觉，宝瓶座的时代来临。

definition: Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Virgo (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Gemini (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Sagittarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/popular variant of 人馬座|人马座[Ren2 ma3 zuo4]
Capricorn (constellation and sign of the zodiac)
Vesta, an asteroid, second most massive object in the asteroid belt between Mars and Jupiter, discovered in 1807 by H.W. Olbers
see 十二宮|十二宫[shi2 er4 gong1]
